document_data.name: ''Pride of the Legion''
document_data.mainbody: The '''''Pride of the Legion''''' was a set of [[full plate]] [[armor]] that was worn by the soldiers of [[Unther]].
document_data.Powers: This suit of ''+2 full plate mail'' offered significant protection against slashing and piercing weapons.
document_data.History: While they were commonly found among the soldiers of the [[Old Empires|ancient empire]] of Unther, they were rarely found during the 14{{th}} century [[DR]]. Those that were still in existence during that time were most often found among collectors and could fetch a small fortune if sold.
